invite_group.subject: %invite.inviter.display_name% has invited you to join %group.name% group in %network.name%
invite_group.message:
%invite.inviter.image%
Dear %invite.invited_user_name%,

I have created my own group called %group.name% Group on the %network.name% network and I'd like you to come and join us!

The %group.name% Group has it's own blog, forum, media gallery and we'll be able to see who else is a member of the Group. Once you have accepted this invitation, you will be able to:

Post blog posts into the %group.name% Group blog
Upload media into the %group.name% Group media gallery
Participate in any %group.name% Group forum threads
Invite others to come and join the %group.name% Group

If you want an overview of this group, click here:

%group.link%
If you are already a registered member of %config_site_name%, click here to accept this invitation:

%invite.accept_url%

If you are NOT a registered member of %config_site_name%, then click here to register and accept this invitation:

%invite.register_link%

Here is the personalized message for you from %invite.inviter.display_name%

%invite.message%

Thanks

%invite.inviter.display_name%

invite_group_by_member.subject: %invite.inviter.display_name% has invited you to join the %group.name% group in the %network.name% network
invite_group_by_member.message:
%invite.inviter.display_name% has invited you to join %group.name% group on the %network.name% network
%invite.inviter.image%
Dear %invite.invited_user_name%,

I am a member of group called %group.name% Group on the %network.name% network and I'd like you to come and join us!

%group.name% 's Description

%group.description%

The %group.name% Group has it's own blog, forum, media gallery and we'll be able to see who else is a member of the Group.

Once you have accepted this invitation, you will be able to:
Post blog posts into the %group.name% Group blog
Upload media into the %group.name% Group media gallery
Participate in any %group.name% Group forum threads
Invite others to come and join the %group.name% Group
If you want an overview of this group, click here:
%group.link%

If you are already a registered member of %config_site_name%, click here to accept this invitation:
%invite.accept_link%

If you are NOT a registered member of %config_site_name%, then click here to register and accept this invitation:
%invite.register_link%

Here is the personalized message for you from %invite.inviter.display_name%

%invite.message%

Thanks
%invite.inviter.display_name%

invite_pa.subject: %invite.inviter.display_name% has invited you to join %network.name%
invite_pa.message:
%invite.inviter.display_name% has invited you to join %network.name% network!

%invite.inviter.image%
Hey %invite.invited_user_name%,

I've discovered a social network called %config_site_name%, but this one is different: it's a 'digital lifestyle aggregator' (DLA)


%network.name% 's Description

%network.description%

%config_site_name% provides you with your own blog, personal pages, media gallery and allows you to create your own Groups.

It even allows you to create your own MySpace-in-a-Box - your own social network!

Joining %config_site_name% lets you import your own external account information from Facebook and Flickr, combine that external info with any of your internal %config_site_name% info, create Widgets with this info, and place those Widgets in your blog, other social networks or dashboard interfaces.
You'll be able to share you media, moderate your own Groups and Networks and blog to your heart's content.

Click here to register:
%invite.register_link%

Or, if you are already registered on %config_site_name%, click here to let me know you're already in:
%invite.accept_link%

Here is the personalized message for you from %invite.inviter.display_name%

%invite.message%

Thanks,
%invite.inviter.display_name%

invitation_accept.subject: %invite.invited.display_name% has accepted your invitation to join %network.name% network in %config_site_name%
invitation_accept.message:
Congratulations!

%invite.invited.display_name% has accepted your invitation to join %network.name% network in %config_site_name%

You have defined %invite.invited.display_name% as a %invite.relation_type% kind of relationship.

To view %invite.invited.display_name%'s public blog page view the following link:
%invite.invited.profile_link%

You can now share media with, send messages to and invite %invite.invited.display_name% into any of your Group and/or %network.link%

You can also control access to your profile info, content, media and meta-data by selecting 'Immediate Relations' in any of your 'Edit your Account' settings screens.

Thanks
The %config_site_name% Team

forgot_password.subject: Your %config_site_name% username/password information
forgot_password.message:
Dear %recipient.display_name%,

As we understand it, you have requested a copy of your current username and password.
Here they are: username:%recipient.login_name%

To change your password, click on the link below (or copy the URL and paste it into your browser):
%change_password_url%

Thanks
The %config_site_name% Team

friend_request_sent.subject: %relation.inviter.display_name% has requested to add you as a friend
friend_request_sent.message:
%relation.inviter.image%
Hey %relation.invited.display_name%,

%relation.inviter.display_name% has requested to establish a relationship with you. They wish to make you one of their friends on %config_site_name%.

If you are already a member of %config_site_name%, click on this link to accept this request:
%relation.appr_deny_link%

Once you have accepted this invitation, you will be able to: share any of your public media with %relation.inviter.profile_link%
view any of %relation.inviter.display_name%'s controlled access profile info, content or meta-data
have a private message sent to you by %relation.inviter.display_name%
be invited into any of %relation.inviter.display_name%'s Groups or Networks.

Thanks
%network.owner.display_name%

friend_request_approved.subject: %relation.invited.display_name% has accepted your invitation to be your friend
friend_request_approved.message:
Congratulations!

%relation.invited.display_name% has accepted your connection request!

You have defined %relation.invited.display_name% as a %relation.type% kind of relationship.

To view the %relation.invited.display_name% public blog page, click on the following link (or copy and paste the URL into your browser):
%relation.invited.profile_link%

To view ALL of your friends and relations, click here (or copy and paste the URL into your browser):
%relation.friend_list_link%
Thank you
The %config_site_name% Team

friend_request_denial.subject: %relation.invited.display_name% has denied your request to be your friend
friend_request_denial.message:
Our condolences,

We're sorry to have to be the bearer of bad news, but your request to be friend %relation.invited.display_name% has been denied.
Sorry again,

The %config_site_name% Team

bulletin_sent.subject: %config_site_name% bulletin: %bulletin.subject%
bulletin_sent.message:
%network.owner.image% %network.owner.display_name% has sent you a bulletin:
%bulletin.message%

Thanks

group_created.subject: %group.owner.display_name% has created a Group in your network %network.name%
group_created.message:
%group.owner.image%
Dear %network.owner.display_name%,

%group.owner.display_name% has created the group %group.name% in your network, %network.name% %network.link%

To view the %group.name% group go to %group.link%

Regards,
The %config_site_name% Team

group_settings_updated.subject: %group.owner.display_name% has updated groups settings for a Group in your network %network.name%
group_settings_updated.message:
%group.owner.image%
Dear %network.owner.display_name%,

%group.owner.display_name% has changed group settings for %group.name% group in your network, %network.name% %network.link%

To view the %group.name% group go to %group.link%

Regards,
The %config_site_name% Team
group_settings_updated.description: Group settings data updated Notification Mail

network_join.subject: %requester.display_name% has joined your network %network.name%
network_join.message:
Dear %network.owner.display_name%,

%requester.image% %requester.display_name% has joined your network, %network.name%:

%network.link%
You now have %network.member_count% members in the %network.name% network.

To view this new member's public blog page, go to:
%requester.profile_link%

To moderate this new member's account, go to the %network.member_moderation_link%

Best regards,

The %config_site_name% Team

media_uploaded.subject: %content.author.display_name% has uploaded media into your network %network.name%
media_uploaded.message:
%content.author.image% Dear %network.owner.display_name%,

%content.author.display_name% has uploaded a media item into your network, %network.link%

To view this content click here: %content.link%

To view or listen to %content.author.display_name%'s media item, go to:
%media.full_view_link%

To moderate this %content.author.display_name%'s media, go to the %content.moderation_link%

Regards,
The %config_site_name% Team


Everyone at %config_site_name% respects your privacy. Your information will never be shared with third parties unless specifically requested by you.

group_media_uploaded.subject: %content.author.display_name% has uploaded media into a Group on your network %network.name%
group_media_uploaded.message:
%content.author.image% Dear %network.owner.display_name%,

%content.author.display_name% has uploaded a media item into a Group on your network, %network.link%

To view this content click here: %content.link%

To view or listen to %content.author.display_name%'s media item, go to:
%media.full_view_link%

To moderate this %content.author.display_name%'s media, go to the %content.moderation_link%

To view Group where media uploaded click here %group.link%

Regards,
The %config_site_name% Team


Everyone at %config_site_name% respects your privacy. Your information will never be shared with third parties unless specifically requested by you.

content_posted_to_comm_blog.subject: %content.author.display_name% has posted something to the %network.name% Community Blog
content_posted_to_comm_blog.message:
%network.owner.image%
Dear %network.owner.display_name%,

%content.author.display_name% has posted some content into your network, %network.name% community blog %network.link%
%content.title%

To view or listen to %content.author.display_name%'s full content post, go to:
%content.link%

To moderate this %content.author.display_name%'s content, go to the %content.moderation_link%

Regards,
The %config_site_name% Team

content_posted.subject: %content.author.display_name% has posted something to the %network.name%
content_posted.message:
%network.owner.image%
Dear %network.owner.display_name%,

%content.author.display_name% has posted some content into your network, %network.link%
%content.title%

To view or listen to %content.author.display_name%'s full content post, go to:
%content.link%

To moderate this %content.author.display_name%'s content, go to the %content.moderation_link%

Regards,
The %config_site_name% Team

content_modified.subject: %content.author.display_name% has modified a content on the %network.name%
content_modified.message:
%network.owner.image%
Dear %network.owner.display_name%,

%content.author.display_name% has modified a content into your network, %network.link%
%content.title%

To view or listen to %content.author.display_name%'s full content post, go to:
%content.link%

To moderate this %content.author.display_name%'s content, go to the %content.moderation_link%

Regards,
The %config_site_name% Team

reciprocated_relation_estab.subject: 2 Members of your Network have established a reciprocated relationship.
reciprocated_relation_estab.message:
2 Members of your Network have established a reciprocated relationship
Dear %network.owner.display_name%,

%relation.inviter.display_name% and %relation.invited.display_name% have just establsihed a reciprocated relationship on your network, %network.name% %network.link%

There are now %network.member_count% Members in your %network.name% network- of which %network.reci_relation_count% reciprocated relation's have been established.

To moderate these members you can click here to go to the Network Operator screen to moderate members:
%network.member_moderation_link%

Regards,
The %config_site_name% Team

relationship_created_with_other_member.subject: %relation.inviter.display_name% has added you as a friend
relationship_created_with_other_member.message:
%relation.invited.image%
Dear %relation.invited.display_name%,

%relation.inviter.display_name% has established a relationship with you.

There is nothing you can do to prevent this from happening, as this network has non-reciprocated relationships.

But you don't have to worry about anything, there is nothing they can do to you - except claim that they are your friend.

By having a relationship established with Network Member they will be able to: Share any of their public media with you (if you want to) — Allow you to view any of their controlled access profile info, content or meta-data — Send the them a private message — Be invited into any of their Groups or Networks (which you can totally ignore). To view this NetworkMember's public blog page, click on the following link (or copy and paste the URL into your browser): %relation.inviter.profile_link%

To view ALL of your friends and relations, click here (or copy and paste the URL into your browser):
%relation.friend_list_link%

Thank you
The %config_site_name% Team

invite_accept_group.subject: %invite.invited.display_name% has accepted your invitation to join the %group.name% Group
invite_accept_group.message:
%invite.invited.image% %invite.invited.display_name% has accepted your invitation to join the %group.name% Group
Congratulations!

To view the %group.name% Group, click on the following link (or copy and paste the URL into your browser):
%group.link%
There are now %group.member_count% members in the %group.name% Group.

Thanks
The %config_site_name% Team

group_join.subject: %requester.display_name% has joined your Group %group.name% in the %network.name% network
group_join.message:
Dear %group.owner.display_name%,

%requester.display_name% has joined your Group %group.name% in the %network.name% network.

To view the %group.name% Group go to:
%group.link%

To moderate the %group.name% Group, go to:
%group.moderation_link%
Very best regards,

The %config_site_name% Team

group_join_request.subject: %requester.display_name% has requested to join your Group %group.name% in the %network.name% network
group_join_request.message:
Dear %group.owner.display_name%,

%requester.display_name% has requested to join your Group %group.name% in the %network.name% network.

To view the %group.name% Group go to:
%group.link%

To moderate the %group.name% Group, go to:
%group.moderation_link%
Very best regards,

The %config_site_name% Team

create_new_user_by_admin.subject: Hi, %recipient.display_name% Welcome to %network.name%!
create_new_user_by_admin.message:
Hi %recipient.display_name% ,

%greeting.message%


Follow the link below to access your new account. You may change the password we've provided
as soon as you login by going to Me and clicking the edit button on your About module for Edit Profile Settings.


Your username: %recipient.login_name%
password: %user.password%

Click here %user.link% to start using %network.name% social network

Or

Follow this %edit.link% to Edit your profile.

Very best regards,

The %config_site_name% Team

msg_waiting_blink.subject: %requester.display_name% has sent you a message in %network.name% network on %config_site_name%
msg_waiting_blink.message:
Dear %recipient.display_name%,

%requester.display_name% has sent you a message in %network.name% network on %config_site_name%.

To view the %requester.display_name% Public page go to:
%requester.profile_link%

To view the message sent, go to:
%recipient.messages_link%
best regards,

The %config_site_name% Team

relation_added.subject: Hi %network.owner.display_name%. A relation is added in your network %network.name%
relation_added.message:
Dear %network.owner.display_name%,
A relation is added in your network %network.name%


To view relationship establisher account go to:
%relation.inviter.profile_link%

To view related user account go to:
%relation.invited.profile_link%

Very best regards,

The %config_site_name% Team

report_abuse_on_content.subject: %config_site_name% %abuse.reporter.display_name% has reported an abuse about some content in your network %network.name%
report_abuse_on_content.message:
Dear %network.owner.display_name%,

%abuse.reporter.display_name% has reported an abuse about some content in your network %network.name%.

%abuse.reporter.display_name% reported:
%abuse.report%
Click Here %abuse.link% to view that content.

Click here %abuse.delete_content_link% to delete that content.

Thanks
The %config_site_name% Team.

report_abuse_grp_owner.subject: %abuse.reporter.display_name% has reported an abuse about some content in your group %group.name% in network %network.name%
report_abuse_grp_owner.message:
Dear %group.owner.display_name%,

%abuse.reporter.display_name% has reported an abuse about some content your group %group.name% network %network.name%.

%abuse.reporter.display_name% reported:
%abuse.report%
Click Here %abuse.link% to view that content.

Click here %abuse.delete_content_link% to delete that content.

Click here %group.link% to have an overview of your group %group.name%

Thanks
The %config_site_name% Team.

report_abuse_on_comment.subject: %abuse.reporter.display_name% has reported an abuse about some comment in your network %network.name%
report_abuse_on_comment.message:
Dear %network.owner.display_name%,

%abuse.reporter.display_name% has reported an abuse about some comment in your network %network.name%.

%abuse.reporter.display_name% reported:
%abuse.report%
Click Here %abuse.link% to view that comment as well as content.

Click here %abuse.delete_comment_link% to delete that comment

Thanks
The %config_site_name% Team.

report_abuse_on_comment_grp_owner.subject: %abuse.reporter.display_name% has reported an abuse about some comment in your group %group.name% in network %network.name%
report_abuse_on_comment_grp_owner.message:
Dear %group.owner.display_name%,

%abuse.reporter.display_name% has reported an abuse about some comment your group %group.name% in network %network.name%.

%abuse.reporter.display_name% reported:
%abuse.report%
Click Here %abuse.link% to view that comment as well as content.

Click here %abuse.delete_comment_link% to delete that comment

Click here %group.link% to have an overview of your group %group.name%

Thanks
The %config_site_name% Team.

activate_account.subject: Hi %recipient.display_name%, Please activate your %config_site_name% account.
activate_account.message:
Hi %recipient.display_name%,

Activate your %config_site_name% account by clicking the following link:
%account.activation_url%

Regards,
The %config_site_name% Team

new_user_registered.subject: A new user registered on %config_site_name%
new_user_registered.message:
Congratulations!

You have a new user %requester.display_name% registered on %config_site_name%

To view %requester.display_name%'s public blog page view the following link:
%requester.profile_link%


Thanks
The %config_site_name% Team

welcome_message.subject: %recipient.display_name%, Welcome to %network.name%
welcome_message.message:
Dear %recipient.display_name%,
Thank you for registering at %config_site_name%.
To visit %network.name%, click here: %network.link%
Your personal profile is here: %recipient.profile_link%.


Enjoy!
%network.owner.display_name%
